meanings.definition: Excessively flattering or ingratiating in a way that is perceived as insincere or smug.
meanings.sent1: The salesman's smarmiest smile couldn't hide his true intentions.
meanings.sent2: She always wore the smarmiest outfits to impress her boss.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave me the smarmiest look when I forgot to feed it on time.
meanings.sent4: His smarmiest compliments were like sugar-coated lies.
meanings.sent5: The politician's smarmiest speech left a bad taste in everyone's mouth.

meanings.definition: Displaying an excessive or unctuous politeness or charm.
meanings.sent1: The waiter's smarmiest attitude annoyed the customers.
meanings.sent2: She put on her smarmiest voice to ask for a favor.
meanings.sent3: The smarmiest cat in the neighborhood always demanded attention.
meanings.sent4: His smarmiest behavior made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The smarmiest smile on his face hid his true feelings.
